text: Sahara Cross is a 1977 Italian action movie directed by Tonino Valerii. It stars Franco Nero, Michel Constantin, Pamela Villoresi and was distributed by F.A.R. == Other websites == * Category:1977 action movies Category:Italian action movies Category:Movies set in Africa Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies directed by Tonino Valerii
title: Sahara Cross
